name: BadAds
description:
Just an average day, your friend told you about this amazing film and sent you a link to watch it. You boot up your pc and proceed to watch it.

Use R to restart your PC (Just in the game, chill)

Made for the GDKO-2023 GameJam Round 3 under the premise "Make a Boss Battle"

Music Used: In the hall of the mountain king - Edvard Grieg (Arranged by Kevin MacLeod)

Also Shoutout to ArtisticDude for those sweet swish sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/swishes-sound-pack
